nodes.text: Ardo Barodai was a Mon Calamari male officer in the New Republic's Fleet Intelligence who oversaw operations of Vanguard Squadron.

Ardo Barodai was a Mon Calamari male who lived on Mon Cala during the Galactic Empire occupation of the planet. There he worked as a bartender, listening to Imperial officers and passing intelligence to the Rebel Alliance.
Barodai was a skilled strategist and spymaster.
